snippet.title: NIGHT/SHADE: You're The Drug - Visual Novel Trailer
snippet.description:
NIGHT/SHADE is a visual novel about overcoming the toxicity within interpersonal relationships as well as within oneself. 

✨  KICKSTARTER LINK ✨ https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/kingasphy/night-shade-youre-the-drug

This character driven plot explores the complexities of love and loss in the form of a romantic thriller through the eyes of our main character, Sasha, while he navigates life's darker elements and tries not to get caught in the crossfire of two ruthless crime syndicates. Estimated game release once we have been funded is late 2021.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Official website: https://nightshadevn.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NIGHTSHADE_vn
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nightshade_vn/
